summary:
- **CEO Appointment**: Zubin Appoo appointed as permanent CEO of WiseTech Global, effective immediately.  
- **Succession**: Replaces Andrew Cartledge (Interim CEO since Oct 2024), who will retire at end of 2025.  
- **Remuneration**: Base salary of A$700k p.a. + equity grants of up to A$1.75M p.a. (performance-linked).  

No material trading or capital markets impact identified.
